title: Bharga
overview: Soumendu Sanyal, a kind-hearted teacher, and his daughter Sharmila, a social worker, bond through a happy family. After a year of getting married to Koustav, one night Sharmila is brutally raped by business tycoon Saibal Banerjee's son Roni and his friends. Soumendu launches a court case against them, and they are declared innocent. The story explores the emotional bond between father and daughter.
